content: the pattern gives directions for adding a skirt to your soaker to make it a cute skooter skort for your little girl there are instructions for sizes preemie through x-large in both the lacey skooter skort and the pleated skooter skort *****this pattern is an extension to the dandelion dreamers soaker pattern and only includes instructions for adding a skirt to the soaker - you must have the latest version version c1 - released 5/14/07 of the soaker pattern if you have an older version please email me for the updated version *****
